page.title: 19The churches in Filey.
page.content: There are 6 places of worship in the area.Three are Church of England, St.John's,St.Oswald's and St.Thomas's. St.Mary's Catholic church is in Brooklands and there is a Salvation Army Hall.The two Methodist chapels amalgamated in 1973 to form one congregation. Average attendance for May 1985. { C.of E. Catholic Methodist 284 227 195 Number of marriages,Jan-May 1985. { 9 0 1 Number of funerals,Jan-May 1985. { 50 3 5} Number of baptisms,Jan-May 1985. { 14 1 2} There were 9 confirmations at St.Oswalds by the Bishop of Hull. { {
